member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.ShippingPaymentDiscount.ShippingPaymentDiscount
member.summary: Reresents shipping and payment method discount The shipping and payment method discount lets you apply a discount to orders where the customer has chosen a certain shipping and/or payment method

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.ShippingPaymentDiscount.ShippingPaymentDiscount.ProcessOrder(Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.Orders.Order)
member.summary: Processes order by adding discount line to order lines

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.ShippingPaymentDiscount.ShippingPaymentDiscount.GetOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves options as shippings and payment method
member.returns: HashTable with ID and Name of shipping method or payment ID and name
